title: Number of Burger King restaurants in the Asia Pacific region from 2012 to 2013
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of restaurants on the Y-axis for 12 different Countries for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest Number of restaurants for Country Australia and 2012 had the lowest Number of restaurants for Country Philippines.
There is a gap of 328.0 between the highest and lowest Number of restaurants found for 2012 in Country Australia and Philippines.
Averaging all 2 groups 2012, and 2013, the Country Australia is the maximum Number of restaurants and Thailand is the minimum Number of restaurants.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of restaurants on the Y-axis for 12 different Countries in year 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Australia had the maximum Number of restaurants among all 2 groups, and it was for 2013. The minimum Number of restaurants was observed in Country Philippines for 2012.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of restaurants on the Y-axis for 12 different Countries in year 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest Number of restaurants for Country Australia and 2012 had the lowest Number of restaurants for Country Philippines.
There is a gap of 328.0 between the highest and lowest Number of restaurants found for 2012 in Country Australia and Philippines.
Averaging all 2 groups 2012, and 2013, the Country Australia is the maximum Number of restaurants and Thailand is the minimum Number of restaurants.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of restaurants on the Y-axis for 12 different Countries in year 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Country Australia, 2013 had the highest Number of restaurants 371.0 among the 2 groups and in Philippines, 2012 had the lowest Number of restaurants 29.0.
For Country Australia, 2012 had the maximum Number of restaurants and it saw the lowest in Country Philippines out of all 12 Countries.
The maximum Number of restaurants for 2012 that was found in Country Australia was 12.31 times larger than the minimum Number of restaurants observed in Country Philippines.
Averaging all 2 groups 2012, and 2013, the Country Australia is the maximum Number of restaurants and Thailand is the minimum Number of restaurants.
